plan: [MAJORITY-Grok] Technical indicators show increasing bullish momentum (MACD hist positive, price above EMAs and BB middle), supported by bid-heavy order book (2.12 ratio). However, low RVOL and imminent US employment data suggest potential volatility spikes, warranting caution. Portfolio heavily weighted in BTC (99.97%), limiting buy upside; HOLD aligns with requiring confirmed signals post-event while respecting exposure limits.
